ff2021F4045.1 Themed Team-Up: Frightful Four
Rarity: Limited Edition
Looking for Inventory Management? Please Login w/ "Remember Me?" option selected.
Themed Team-Up: Frightful Four
If Wizard is on a Frightful Four themed team, at the beginning of your turn, you may choose a friendly character with a "Frightful Four" trait on your Sideline. Wizard can use that character's "Frightful Four" trait until you choose again.
0 Points
Special Powers
THEMED TEAM-UP: FRIGHTFUL FOUR: If Wizard is on a Frightful Four themed team, at the beginning of your turn, you may choose a friendly character with a "Frightful Four" trait on your Sideline. Wizard can use that character's "Frightful Four" trait until you choose again.

Goop
Yeah its mistyped above. It says "start of your turn" on the card. Anyway this trait is great. It gives you a whole extra frightful four a extra trait to utilize and you dont even need to be playing the figure. You can also change it every turn depending on game state. Love this teamup. I hope they continue to make more Frightful Four pieces with similar traits.
